id.description: The unique identifier of the cohort data.

data_group_id.description: The identifier of the data group to which the cohort belongs.

name.description: The name or title of the cohort data.

description.description: A brief description or summary of the cohort data.

created.description: The date and time when the cohort data was created.

count.description: The total count or number associated with the cohort data.

is_visible.description: A flag indicating the visibility status of the cohort data.

project_id.description: The identifier of the project to which the cohort data belongs.
